Headline: #4 Cottage Grove & #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/31st
ShortDescription: SB 4 Cottage Grove & X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 31st, State, 35th, Michigan due to, police activity by Michigan/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove & #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 31st, State, 35th, Michigan due to, police activity near Michigan/31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Van Buren, Ogden, and Damen due to, street blockage near Jackson/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Van Buren, Ogden, and Damen due to, street blockage near Jackson/Damen.
